messages.title: Re-election Support
messages.content: I am writing to ask for your support to re-elect me as your Member of Parliament and to thank you for the wonderful reception I have enjoyed so far.

messages.title: Infrastructure and Services
messages.content: To enable me to continue fighting for our infrastructure and services please give me your support.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing better schools, health services, and transport links.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election could be close. Please donâ€™t leave it to others to vote!

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked with individuals and communities across Gordon to improve our area.

quotes.text: I am writing to ask for your support to re-elect me as your Member of Parliament...

leaflet.additionalNotes: Mentions of specific infrastructure projects such as the Third Don crossing, AWPR, Crossrail, and Inveramsay Bridge point to a focus on local development. Also notes 'The Olympic pool in Aberdeen is a good start but we need to improve facilities across Gordon.'
